Uses of Interface
edu.amc.sakai.user.LdapConnectionLivenessValidator

  • Packages that use LdapConnectionLivenessValidator 
    Package Description
    edu.amc.sakai.user  

    • Uses of LdapConnectionLivenessValidator in edu.amc.sakai.user

      Classes in edu.amc.sakai.user that implement LdapConnectionLivenessValidator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConsensusLdapConnectionLivenessValidator
      A "federating" LdapConnectionLivenessValidator implemenation which requires all delegates to validate a given connection.
      class  MaxLifetimeLdapConnectionLivenessValidator 
      class  NativeLdapConnectionLivenessValidator 
      class  SearchExecutingLdapConnectionLivenessValidator
      Tests LDAPConnection liveness by executing a search filter and verifying that the result contains at least one entry.
      Methods in edu.amc.sakai.user that return LdapConnectionLivenessValidator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LdapConnectionLivenessValidator PooledLDAPConnectionFactory.getConnectionLivenessValidator()
      Access the strategy for verifying LDAPConnection liveness.
      protected LdapConnectionLivenessValidator PooledLDAPConnectionFactory.newDefaultConnectionLivenessValidator()
      As implemented, will return a new NativeLdapConnectionLivenessValidator.
      Methods in edu.amc.sakai.user that return types with arguments of type LdapConnectionLivenessValidator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<LdapConnectionLivenessValidator> ConsensusLdapConnectionLivenessValidator.getDelegates()
      Assign the list of LdapConnectionLivenessValidators to consult when validating any given connection.
